name: The Garden of Earthly Regrets
description:
A mystery game of garden exploration — you are in a garden, or are you? Things have happened here, or have they?

''The Garden of Earthly Regrets'' was my entry for the 2022 Lindenbaum prize for short gamebook fiction, a competition for short, paper-based, interactive fiction.

This is a playable interactive version of the original. (If you'd like to see the original, it's available on the Lindenbaum voting page.)

Features
  • Short choice-based gameplay (15-30 minutes)
  • Multiple endings ... but user chosen endings (pick what you think you should get)
  • Solve a murder .... or a romance ...
